head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCVEIGH, CHARLES S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCVEIGH, CHARLES S.

block.p: McVEIGH-Charles S., Jr. Charles S. McVeigh, Jr. died suddenly at his home in Syosset on September 27. He is survived by a daughter, Lynne McVeigh, two sons, Charles S. McVeigh III and Johnson B. McVeigh, five grandchildren and two great grandchildren. A Memorial Service will be held at a later date.

McVEIGH-Charles S., Jr. The partners of Morris & McVeigh LLP mourn the loss of their dear friend and partner of many years, Charles S. McVeigh, Jr., who died on September 27. We shall greatly miss his wise counsel and his comforting presence. We extend our deepest sympathy to his family.
